name: Create new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet from new survey responses in dotdigital
description:
This template periodically checks for new survey responses in dotdigital and adds the responses to a target Google Sheets spreadsheet. 

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1tfDYuYyd9DkTOkBQgJNKc53VPVvF9KKEhNcx91Cty7k/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as a destination for the dotdigital responses. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template assumes that your dotdigital survey collects these responses in this order:
1) Email
2) First name
3) Last name

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
